name: Midnight Bloom
loreDescription: A type of firework used at the Full Moon Festival Afterparty. Its blooms vary from huge explosions that illuminate the entire night sky to small bursts shaped like delightful plants and animals.

skillDescription.base: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by 8.0%. Does not stack with same effects.
skillDescription.max: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by 16.0%. Does not stack with same effects.
